forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds under a gentle sway of partly cloudy skies, the air cool and refreshing as it drapes softly over the city. With the temperature lingering around a pleasant 54 degrees, the scene evokes a sense of calm, while whispers of a light southwest wind rustle through the streets. As the day progresses, a bright sun will take its rightful place overhead, coaxing the temperature to climb near 66 degrees before settling back to a comfortable 64 in the afternoon. The breeze, a mix of playful and firm, dances in from the west-southwest, creating a delightful backdrop against which the city will awaken.

This early glimpse into Saturday invites the curious to embrace the outdoors, whether it be taking a stroll along the Embarcadero, indulging in a leisurely breakfast at a local café, or simply basking in the warmth of the sun while relaxing on a well-worn bench. While fog may linger at the periphery, offering the Golden Gate its infamous mystique, the heart of the city enjoys clarity and vibrance, painting a pleasing tableau on this summer's day. A light sweater or a light jacket, easily shed in the afternoon warmth, would be the perfect companion as you navigate the evolving cityscape.
